name: Lengend of Mr Yung
description:
We are a new game-making team, and this is our first procudtion.
We conbined Chinese Kungfu and Future Tech Ordnance as two incompatible Games.
For control: move :WSAD  ; attack： j
As Mr Yung use kungfu, you should get close to the tanks and continuesly attack for about 10 hits then you will get 10 score;
As the game is really difficult, if you restart after you died, your score will not be wiped out. 
We are new so we don't konw how to make a playable game on website, there's some small problem.
Have fun, guys.
